name: Lightning Assault
description:
Experience the thrill of air combat in this explosive 360 degrees 2D air combat arcade adventure!

Fly a modern fighter jet to defeat alien UFOs and blow up gigantic alien mother ships about to invade your planet.
Gain back control over occupied territory in epic dogfights and defend it against aliens that just don't want to give up.

Fight your way to the top and climb up the air force ranks while distinguishing yourself in combat.

Earn credits for kills, skills and completed missions to unlock and upgrade combat aircraft as well as multiple special high-tech weapons.

Choose from a huge arsenal of powerful gatlings, guided missiles, smart bombs, lasers, and a railgun to blow the vast alien invasion fleet out of the skies all around the globe.

While saving the world from the alien invasion, earn medals for your combat achievements and lead your friends as the best pilot.

Get ready for the hottest dogfight challenge available!
